org.manathome.totask2.controller

Class WorkEntryController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.manathome.totask2.controller.WorkEntryController

  • @RestController
public class WorkEntryController
extends Object
    REST controller providing work data for one day, will be used by totask2.mobile app.
    Since:
    2015-02-28
    See Also:
    WorkEntry

      REST API. get all workEntries for user and current day (including dummy entries for not yet logged ones).

    • Method Detail

      • restSave

        @RequestMapping(value="APP/REST/workEntry",
                method=POST)
public WorkEntry restSave(@Validated @RequestBody
                                                                                                     WorkEntryTransfer entryToSave)
        REST API APP/REST/workEntry POST, insert / update WorkEntry. hint: http.csrf().disable(); required.
        Parameters:
        entryToSave - entry to save, sent from mobile app.
        Returns:
        saved entry (including workEntry.id
        See Also:
        saved data, tranfered data

      • restWorkEntries

        @RequestMapping(value="APP/REST/workEntries",
                method=GET)
public List<WorkEntry> restWorkEntries()
        REST API. get all workEntries for user and current day (including dummy entries for not yet logged ones).
        Returns:
        List of WorkEntries of all possible work entries (created and potentially created, later hav id of 0).

      • restWorkEntries

        @RequestMapping(value="APP/REST/workEntries/{day}",
                method=GET)
public List<WorkEntry> restWorkEntries(@PathVariable(value="day")
                                                                                                                         String day)
        REST API. get all workEntries for user and given day (including dummy entries for not yet logged ones).
        Parameters:
        day - date, formatted YYYY-MM-DD.
        Returns:
        List of WorkEntries of all possible work entries (created and potentially created, later hav id of 0).
